1{-# LANGUAGE ViewPatterns #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Next character sequence.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol.Next
7  ( -- * Next
8    InputText,
9    Next, AbNext,
10    nextSpace,
11    nextQQ,
12    nextBefore,
13  ) where
14
15import qualified Data.Char                              as Ch
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture               as O
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                   as B
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol.Message  as Msg
19
20-- | Input data type.
21type InputText = String
22
23-- | Split next character sequence from input text.
24type Next a = InputText -> (InputText, a)
25
26-- | Split next character sequence from input text.
27type AbNext a = InputText -> B.Ab (InputText, a)
28
29-- | Test double punctuation character.
30isQQ :: O.Test Char
31isQQ = (== '"')
32
33-- | Get next spaces.
34--   Space character is decided by 'Ch.isSpace'.
35--
36--   >>> nextSpace " abc"
37--   ("abc", 1)
38--
39--   >>> nextSpace " \tabc"
40--   ("abc", 2)
41--
42nextSpace :: Next Int
43nextSpace = loop 0 where
44    loop n (O.tCut -> O.Jp c cs)
45        | Ch.isSpace c   = loop (n + 1) cs
46    loop n cs            = (cs, n)
47
48-- | Get next double quoted text.
49--   A single double quote ends text.
50--   A double double quote does not end text,
51--   but it is converted to double quote.
52--
53--   >>> nextQQ "abc\" def"
54--   Right (" def","abc")
55--
56--   >>> nextQQ "abc\"\"def\" ghi"
57--   Right (" ghi","abc\"def")
58--
59nextQQ :: AbNext String
60nextQQ cs0 = loop O.zero cs0 where
61    loop n (O.tCut -> O.Jp c cs)
62        | isQQ c      = qq n cs
63        | otherwise   = loop (n + 1) cs
64    loop _ _          = Msg.quotNotEnd
65
66    qq n (O.tCut -> O.Jp c cs)
67        | isQQ c      = do (cs', s') <- nextQQ cs
68                           Right (cs', O.tTake (n + 1) cs0 O.++ s')
69    qq n cs           = Right (cs, O.tTake n cs0)
70
71-- | Get next text before given delimiter.
72--
73--   >>> nextBefore "''" "abc'' def"
74--   Right (" def","abc")
75--
76nextBefore :: String -> AbNext String
77nextBefore "" _ = B.bug "nextBefore"
78nextBefore (t0 : to) cs0 = loop O.zero cs0 where
79    loop n (O.tCut -> O.Jp c cs)
80        | c == t0     = case O.tDropPrefix to cs of
81                          Just cs' -> Right (cs', O.tTake n cs0)
82                          Nothing  -> loop (n + 1) cs
83        | otherwise   = loop (n + 1) cs
84    loop _ _          = Msg.quotNotEnd
85
